channel.title: future on Allen Baranov's Security Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in future on Allen Baranov's Security Thoughts

item.title: Introduction to Security Thoughts
item.description: Hello World! (Again) I was reading someone’s blog yesterday and thinking just how lucky they were to have a working blog and then I reminded myself that I also have a blog - it is just not working. So I configured it and I now have the ability to blog once more. My first blog was created way back in the Golden Age of blogging and I actually like some of the content on it.
